author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK) on Wednesday announced that partymen who were interested to contest the 2016 Assembly polls in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry could submit their application between January 24 and February 10.

Deposit

Party general secretary K. Anbazhagan said the application for the general constituency should be submitted along with a deposit amount of Rs 25,000.

The amount for women and reserved constituencies is Rs 15,000.

If a party candidate applied for a constituency allotted to the alliance partner, his deposit amount would be returned.

Cost of application

The application cost is Rs 1000.
title: DMK invites aspirants to apply for ticket
